General_Description: '''Bad Romance''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A musician wished to express her love for her [[Sparta]]n husband. Whether by a lock of her hair or with the death of an [[Athens|Athenian]] Commander, she could not decide.
Section_Trivia: *The title of the memory may be a reference to the song ''{{Wiki|Bad Romance}}'' by Lady Gaga.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
